Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:willPresent:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just before the popup bar view is presenting.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:willDismiss:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just before the popup bar view is dismissing.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:didPresent:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just after the popup bar view is presenting.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:didDismiss:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just after the popup bar view is dismissing.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:shouldOpen:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just before the popup content view is about to be open by typing or dragging the popup bar.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:willOpen:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just before the popup content view is about to be open.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:shouldClose:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just before the popup content view is about to be closed by typing the popup close button or dragging the popup content view..

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:willClose:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just before the popup content view is about to be closed.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:didOpen:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just after the popup content view is open.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:didClose:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called just after the popup content view is closed.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:interactivePresentationFor:state:progress:location:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called several times during the interactive transition by user.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupController(_:stateChanged:previousState:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Called when the presentation state of the popup controller has changed.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupControllerTapGestureShouldBegin(_:state:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Implement this to return NO when you want the tap gesture recognizer to be ignored.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.name: popupControllerPanGestureShouldBegin(_:state:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDelegate.html.abstract: Implement this to return NO when you want the pan gesture recognizer to be ignored.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDataSource.ht.name: bottomBarView(for:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDataSource.ht.abstract: Returns a custom bottom bar view. The popup bar will be attached to.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDataSource.ht.name: popupController(_:defaultFrameFor:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDataSource.ht.abstract: Returns the default frame for the bottom bar view.

Protocols/PBPopupControllerDataSource.ht.name: popupController(_:insetsFor:)
Protocols/PBPopupControllerDataSource.ht.abstract: Returns the insets for the bottom bar view from bottom of the container controller’s view. By default, this is set to the container controller view’s safe area insets since iOS 11 or UIEdgeInsets.zero otherwise. Currently, only the bottom inset is respected.

Protocols/PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate.h.name: previewingViewControllerFor(_:)
Protocols/PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate.h.abstract: Called when the user performs a peek action on the popup bar.

Protocols/PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate.h.name: popupBar(_:commit:)
Protocols/PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate.h.abstract: Called when the user performs a pop action on the popup bar.

Protocols/PBPopupBarDataSource.html#/c:@.name: titleLabel(for:)
Protocols/PBPopupBarDataSource.html#/c:@.abstract: Returns a UIlabel subclass object to be used by the popup bar instead of the default title label (for example a MarqueeLabel instance).

Protocols/PBPopupBarDataSource.html#/c:@.name: subtitleLabel(for:)
Protocols/PBPopupBarDataSource.html#/c:@.abstract: Returns a UIlabel subclass object to be used by the popup bar instead of the default subtitle label (for example a MarqueeLabel instance).

Protocols/PBPopupBarDataSource.html.name: PBPopupBarDataSource
Protocols/PBPopupBarDataSource.html.abstract: The data source providing custom labels instances to the popup bar so they can be used instead of the default provided ones.

Protocols/PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate.h.name: PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate
Protocols/PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate.h.abstract: A set of methods used by the delegate to respond, with a preview view controller and a commit view controller, to the user pressing the popup bar object on the screen of a device that supports 3D Touch.

Functions.html#/s:17PBPopupController5PB.name: PBLog(_:error:file:function:_:)
Functions.html#/s:17PBPopupController5PB.abstract: Logs a message to the Apple System Log facility.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: hidesPopupBarWhenPushed
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the popup bar is hidden when the view controller is pushed on to a navigation controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: popupBar
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: The popup bar managed by the system. (read-only).

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: bottomBar
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Returns a view to attach the popup bar to.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: popupContainerViewController
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Returns the container (presenting) view controller for the popup bar, and for the presented view controller (popupContentViewController). May be UIViewController, UINavigationController, UITabBarController or a custom container view controller. (read-only).

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: popupContentViewController
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Returns the popup content view controller of the container. If there is no popup bar presentation, the property will be nil. (read-only).

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: popupContentView
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Returns the view where is embedded the popupContentViewController’s view for presentation. This view has a optional close button and a visual effect view with an optional effect. (read-only).

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: additionalSafeAreaInsetsBottomForContainer
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Custom insets that you specify to modify the container view controller’s safe area (usefull for a custom container). Use this property to adjust the safe area bottom edge inset value of this view controller’s views by the specified amount.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: presentPopupBar(withPopupContentViewController:openPopup:animated:completion:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Presents an interactive popup bar in the container’s view hierarchy and optionally opens the popup in the same animation. The popup bar is attached to the container’s bottom bar (see popupContainerViewController).

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: presentPopupBar(withPopupContentViewController:animated:completion:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Presents an interactive popup bar in the container’s view hierarchy. The popup bar is attached to the container’s bottom bar (see popupContainerViewController).

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: dismissPopupBar(animated:completion:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Dismisses the popup presentation, closing the popup if open and dismissing the popup bar.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: openPopup(animated:completion:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Opens the popup, displaying the content view controller’s view.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: closePopup(animated:completion:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Closes the popup, hiding the content view controller’s view.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.name: updatePopupBarAppearance()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Call this method to update the popup bar appearance (style, tint color, etc.) according to its docking view. You should call this after updating the docking view.

Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.name: displayCornerRadius
Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.abstract: The corner radius of the display. Uses a private property of UIScreen,

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popup(isPresented:isOpen:isHidden:onPresent:onDismiss:onOpen:onClose:popupContent:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Presents a popup bar with popup content.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popup(isPresented:isOpen:isHidden:onPresent:onDismiss:onOpen:onClose:popupContentController:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Presents a popup bar with UIKit popup content view controller.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupCloseButtonStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the popup close button style.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the popup bar style (see PBPopupBarStyle).

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: barStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the bar style of the popup bar toolbar..

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: backgroundStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the popup bar background style that specifies its visual effect appearance.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: backgroundEffect(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the custom popup bar’s background effect. Use nil to use the most appropriate background style for the environment.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: inheritsVisualStyleFromBottomBar(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: If true, the popup bar will automatically inherit its style from the bottom bar.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: isTranslucent(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the popup bar is translucent.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: backgroundColor(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The background color of the popup bar toolbar.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: barTintColor(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The bar tint color of the popup bar toolbar.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: tintColor(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The tint color of the popup bar toolbar.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarProgressViewStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the popup bar’s progress view style.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarBorderViewStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the popup bar’s border view style.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupPresentationStyle(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the popup content view presentation style.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupPresentationDuration(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The popup content view presentation duration when presenting from closed to open state.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupDismissalDuration(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The popup content view dismissal duration when dismissing from open to closed state.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupCompletionThreshold(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The threshold value used to open or close the popup content view when dragging ends.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupContentSize(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: The popup content view size when popupPresentationStyle is set to custom.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupIgnoreDropShadowView(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: If true, tells the popup content view presentation to ignore the form sheet presentation by default.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: shouldExtendCustomBarUnderSafeArea(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Set this property to true if you want the custom popup bar extend under the safe area, to the bottom of the screen.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarCustomView(popupBarContent:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets a custom popup bar view, instead of the default system-provided bars.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarCustomizer(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Gives a low-level access to the PBPopupBar object for customization, beyond what is exposed by LNPopupUI.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupTitle(_:subtitle:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Configures the view’s popup bar title and subtitle.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupTitle(verbatim:subtitle:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupTitle(verbatim:subtitle:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Undocumented

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupLabel(_:sublabel:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Configures the view’s popup bar with custom label and sublabel.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupRoundShadowImage(_:cornerRadius:shadowColor:shadowOffset:shadowOpacity:shadowRadius:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Configures the view’s popup bar image.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupImage(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Configures the view’s popup bar image.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupProgress(_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Configures the view’s popup bar progress.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarItems(leading:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the bar button items to display on the popup bar.

Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.name: popupBarItems(trailing:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:7SwiftUI4ViewP17.abstract: Sets the bar button items to display on the popup bar.

Extensions/UIColor.html.name: UIColor
Extensions/UIColor.html.abstract: A UIColor’s extension that provides random colors.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/c:@.name: deck
Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/c:@.abstract: A presentation style which attempt to recreate the card-like transition found in the iOS 10 Apple Music.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/c:@.name: fullScreen
Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/c:@.abstract: A presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/c:@.name: custom
Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/c:@.abstract: A presentation style in which the presented view covers a part of the screen (height only ???).

Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/s:1.name: default
Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/s:1.abstract: Default presentation style: fullScreen for iOS 9 and above, otherwise deck.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/s:1.name: strings
Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/s:1.abstract: An array of human readable strings for the popup content view presentation styles.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/s:1.name: description
Enums/PBPopupPresentationStyle.html#/s:1.abstract: Return an human readable description for the popup content view presentation style.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: hidden
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup bar is hidden, not presented.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: presenting
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup bar is in presenting transition, will be shown. State will be closed.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: dismissing
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup bar is in dismissing transition, will be hidden, dismissed.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: closed
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup bar is presented, popup content view is closed, hidden.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: open
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup bar is presented, hidden while popup content view is open, shown.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: opening
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup content view is in presenting transition, will be open, shown.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: closing
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup content view is in dismissing transition, will be closed, hidden.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.name: transitioning
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/c:@.abstract: The popup content view is in transitioning transition, will be closed or open.

Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/s:1.name: description
Enums/PBPopupPresentationState.html#/s:1.abstract: Return an human readable description for the PBPopupController state.

Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html#/s:17.name: default
Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html#/s:17.abstract: Default style: Chevron button style for iOS 10 and above, otherwise round button.

Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html#/s:17.name: strings
Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html#/s:17.abstract: An array of human readable strings for the close button styles.

Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html#/s:17.name: description
Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html#/s:17.abstract: Return an human readable description for the popup close button style.

Enums/PBPopupBarBorderViewStyle.html#/s:.name: strings
Enums/PBPopupBarBorderViewStyle.html#/s:.abstract: An array of human readable strings for the border view styles.

Enums/PBPopupBarBorderViewStyle.html#/s:.name: description
Enums/PBPopupBarBorderViewStyle.html#/s:.abstract: Return an human readable description for the progress view style.

Enums/PBPopupBarProgressViewStyle.html#/.name: default
Enums/PBPopupBarProgressViewStyle.html#/.abstract: Default style: none for iOS 10 and above, otherwise bottom.

Enums/PBPopupBarProgressViewStyle.html#/.name: strings
Enums/PBPopupBarProgressViewStyle.html#/.abstract: An array of human readable strings for the progress view styles.

Enums/PBPopupBarProgressViewStyle.html#/.name: description
Enums/PBPopupBarProgressViewStyle.html#/.abstract: Return an human readable description for the progress view style.

Enums/PBPopupBarStyle.html#/s:17PBPopupC.name: default
Enums/PBPopupBarStyle.html#/s:17PBPopupC.abstract: Default style: prominent style for iOS 10 and above, otherwise compact.

Enums/PBPopupBarStyle.html#/s:17PBPopupC.name: strings
Enums/PBPopupBarStyle.html#/s:17PBPopupC.abstract: An array of human readable strings for the popup bar styles.

Enums/PBPopupBarStyle.html#/s:17PBPopupC.name: description
Enums/PBPopupBarStyle.html#/s:17PBPopupC.abstract: Return an human readable description for the popup bar style.

Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html.name: PBPopupCloseButtonStyle
Enums/PBPopupCloseButtonStyle.html.abstract: Available styles for the popup close button.

Classes/PBPopupLogs.html#/s:17PBPopupCon.name: instance
Classes/PBPopupLogs.html#/s:17PBPopupCon.abstract: Returns the shared instance of PBPopupLogs, creating it if necessary.

Classes/PBPopupLogs.html#/s:17PBPopupCon.name: isEnabled
Classes/PBPopupLogs.html#/s:17PBPopupCon.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the logs are enabled for the framework.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: dataSource
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The data source of the PBPopupController object.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: popupBarTapGestureRecognizer
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The tap gesture recognizer attached to the popup bar for presenting the popup content view.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: popupBarPanGestureRecognizer
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The pan gesture recognizer attached to the popup bar for presenting the popup content view.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: popupContentPanGestureRecognizer
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The pan gesture recognizer attached to the popup content view for dismissing the popup content view.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: wantsAdditionalSafeAreaInsetBottom
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: Set this property to false if you want addional safe area insets to be ignored when the popup bar is presented (usefull for iPad when the popup is the neighbour of another object).

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: wantsAdditionalSafeAreaInsetTop
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: Set this property to true if you want addional safe area insets to be on top when the popup bar is presented (usefull for Catalyst when the popup is presented on top).

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: containerPreferredStatusBarStyle
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The preferred status bar style for the container view controller.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: popupPreferredStatusBarStyle
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The preferred status bar style for the popup content view controller when popupPresentationStyle is set to deck.

Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.name: popupStatusBarStyle
Classes/PBPopupController.html#/c:@M@PBP.abstract: The status bar style of the popup content view controller. Return this value when you override the preferredStatusBarStyle variable.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupCloseButton
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The popup close button. (read-only).

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupEffectView
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The visual effect view behind the popup content view (read-only, but its effect can be set to nil).

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupPresentationStyle
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The popup content view presentation style.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupPresentationDuration
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The popup content view presentation duration when presenting from closed to open state.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupDismissalDuration
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The popup content view dismissal duration when dismissing from open to closed state.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupCompletionThreshold
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The threshold value used to open or close the popup content view when dragging.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupCompletionFlickMagnitude
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The flick magnitude value used to open or close the popup content view when dragging.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupContentSize
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The popup content view size when popupPresentationStyle is set to custom.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupCanDismissOnPassthroughViews
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: If true, the popup content view can be dismissed when user interact outside the bounds.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupIgnoreDropShadowView
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: If true, tells the popup content view presentation to ignore the form sheet presentation by default.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupTopModule
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The view containing the top subviews (i.e. labels, image view, etc…) of the popup content view controller (optional but needed if bottom module is used). Used to animate the popup presentation. This view will be used for correctly positioning the bottom module during presentation animation.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupImageModule
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The image view’s container view of the popup content view controller (optional). Useful for shadows. Used to animate the popup presentation.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupImageView
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The image view of the popup content view controller (optional). Used to animate the popup presentation.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupControlsModule
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The view containing the controls subviews (i.e. playback buttons, volume slider, progress view, etc…) of the popup content view controller (optional). Used to animate the popup presentation. This view will be animated so as to be positioned under the image that grows.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupBottomModule
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The view containing the controls subviews (i.e. playback buttons, volume slider, progress view, etc…) of the popup content view controller (optional). Used to animate the popup presentation. This view will be animated so as to be positioned under the image that grows.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupControlsModuleTopConstraint
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: Required if popupControlsModule is provided. This is the top constraint against the popupImageModule view.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupBottomModuleTopConstraint
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: Required if popupBottomModule is provided. This is the top constraint against the popupTopModule view.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupCloseButtonStyle
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The popup close button style.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupCloseButtonAutomaticallyUnobstructsTopBars
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: If true, move close button under navigation bars

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.name: popupContentDraggingView
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The view to which the popup interaction gesture recognizer should be added to. The default implementation returns the popup content view.

Classes/PBPopupCloseButton.html#/c:@M@PB.name: style
Classes/PBPopupCloseButton.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The current style of the popup close button. (read-only)

Classes/PBPopupCloseButton.html#/c:@M@PB.name: intrinsicContentSize
Classes/PBPopupCloseButton.html#/c:@M@PB.abstract: The natural size for the receiving view, considering only properties of the view itself.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: dataSource
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The data source of the PBPopupBar object.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: previewingDelegate
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The previewing delegate object mediates the presentation of views from the preview (peek) view controller and the commit (pop) view controller. In practice, these two are typically the same view controller. The delegate performs this mediation through your implementation of the methods of the PBPopupBarPreviewingDelegate protocol.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: PBPopupBarShowColors
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: For debug: If true, the popup bar will attribute some colors to its subviews.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: popupBarPresentationDuration
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar presentation duration when presenting from hidden to closed state.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: popupTapGestureRecognizer
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The tap gesture recognizer attached to the popup bar for presenting the popup content view.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: customPopupBarViewController
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: Set this property with a custom popup bar view controller object to provide a popup bar with custom content. In this custom view controller, use the preferredContentSize property to set the size of the custom popup bar (example: preferredContentSize = CGSize(width: -1, height: 65)).

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: shouldExtendCustomBarUnderSafeArea
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: Set this property to true if you want the custom popup bar extend under the safe area, to the bottom of the screen.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: inheritsVisualStyleFromBottomBar
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: If true, the popup bar will automatically inherit its style from the bottom bar.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: isFloating
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the popup bar is floating like in iOS 17 (true) or not (false).

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: popupBarStyle
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar style (see PBPopupBarStyle).

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: barStyle
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The bar style of the popup bar toolbar.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: backgroundEffect
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s background effect. Use nil to use the most appropriate background style for the environment.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: floatingBackgroundEffect
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The floating popup bar’s background effect. Use nil to use the most appropriate background style for the environment.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: backgroundStyle
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar background style that specifies its visual effect appearance.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: isTranslucent
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the popup bar is translucent (true) or not (false).

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: backgroundColor
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The background color of the popup bar .

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: floatingBackgroundColor
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The floating popup bar’s background color. Use nil to use the most appropriate background style for the environment.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: backgroundImage
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s background image. Use nil to use the most appropriate background style for the environment.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: backgroundImageContentMode
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The content mode to use when rendering the backgroundImage. Defaults to UIViewContentModeScaleToFill. UIViewContentModeRedraw will be reinterpreted as UIViewContentModeScaleToFill.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: floatingBackgroundImage
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The floating popup bar’s background image. Use nil to use the most appropriate background style for the environment.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: floatingBackgroundImageContentMode
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The content mode to use when rendering the floatingBackgroundImage. Defaults to UIViewContentModeScaleToFill. UIViewContentModeRedraw will be reinterpreted as UIViewContentModeScaleToFill.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: barTintColor
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The tint color to apply to the popup bar background.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: tintColor
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The tint color to apply to the popup bar items.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: image
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s image.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: imageView
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: An image view displayed when the bar style is prominent. (read-only)

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: shadowImageView
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The view providing a shadow layer to the popup bar image view.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: title
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s title.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: titleTextAttributes
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: Display attributes for the popup barâ€™s title text.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: subtitle
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s subtitle.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: subtitleTextAttributes
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: Display attributes for the popup barâ€™s subtitle text.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: accessibilityLabel
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The string that succinctly identifies the accessibility element (titles view, the container for title and subtitle labels).

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: accessibilityHint
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The string that briefly describes the result of performing an action on the accessibility title view (container for title and subtitle labels).

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: semanticContentAttribute
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The semantic description of the viewâ€™s contents, used to determine whether the view should be flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: leftBarButtonItems
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: An array of custom bar button items to display on the left side. Or right side if RTL.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: rightBarButtonItems
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: An array of custom bar button items to display on the right side. Or left side if RTL.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: barButtonItemsSemanticContentAttribute
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The semantic description of the bar items, used to determine the order of bar items when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: progressViewStyle
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s progress view style.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: progress
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar progress view’s progress.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: borderViewStyle
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The popup bar’s border view style.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: accessibilityProgressLabel
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The accessibility label of the progress, in a localized string.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: accessibilityProgressValue
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: The accessibility value of the progress, in a localized string.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.name: updatePopupBarAppearance()
Classes/PBPopupBar.html#/c:@M@PBPopupCon.abstract: Call this method to update the popup bar appearance (style, tint color, etc.) according to its docking view. You should call this after updating the docking view.

Classes/PBPopupBar.html.name: PBPopupBar
Classes/PBPopupBar.html.abstract: A popup bar presented with a container view controller such as a UITabBarController, a UINavigationController, a UIViewController or a custom container view controller. The user can swipe or tap the popup bar at any point to present the popup content view controller. After presenting, the user dismisses the popup content view controller by either swiping or tapping an optional popup close button. The contents of the popup bar is built dynamically using its own properties. The popup bar may be a custom one if PBPopupBar.customPopupBarViewController is set.

Classes/PBPopupCloseButton.html.name: PBPopupCloseButton
Classes/PBPopupCloseButton.html.abstract: A button added to the content’s view when the popup content view controller is presented. The user can dismiss the popup content view controller by either swiping or tapping this popup close button.

Classes/PBPopupContentView.html.name: PBPopupContentView
Classes/PBPopupContentView.html.abstract: The view where is embedded the popupContentViewController’s view for presentation. This view has a optional close button and a visual effect view with an optional effect.

Classes/PBPopupLogs.html.name: PBPopupLogs
Classes/PBPopupLogs.html.abstract: A singleton to enable or disable logging to the Apple System Log facility.

Classes/PBPopupRoundShadowImageView.html.name: PBPopupRoundShadowImageView
Classes/PBPopupRoundShadowImageView.html.abstract: A custom view that provide a shadow’s layer arround an image view with a corner radius.
